nodes.text: Sonic grenades, also known as sonic detonators, were rare and deadly sonic-based explosive weapons. The Bith had such sensitive hearing that the sound of such grenades could make their heads explode. The grenades were very powerful, and had the capability to shatter thick glass, crack ferrocrete, and crumple light alloys. Models of sonic grenades included the Krupx Munitions Groundshaker 7 and the Imperial Munitions M880 Sonic Grenade.
